Question.Questions: What is the fullform of DBMS ?

Question.Option1: Organized collection of tables that cannot be accessed, updated, and managed
Question.Option2: Collection of data or information without organizing
Question.Option3: Organized collection of data or information that can be accessed, updated, and managed
Question.Option4: Organized collection of data that cannot be updated
Question.Correct: Opton3:Organized collection of data or information that can be accessed, updated, and managed

Question.Questions: Which type of data can be stored in the database?
Question.Option3: Data in the form of audio or video

Question.Questions: Rows of a relation are known as the _______.
What do you mean by one to many relationships?
Question.Option1: One class may have many teachers
Question.Option2: One teacher can have many classes
Question.Option3: Many classes may have many teachers
Question.Option4: Many teachers may have many classes
Question.Correct: Option2:One teacher can have many classes
